programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Chiana joins a group of nihilistic teenagers on a cemetery planet.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: An alien boards Moya, deranging the crew.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: An old PK recording reveals Aeryn as one of the murderers of Moya's original pilot.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: A fortunetelling portrait acquired from a passing trader turns out to be the tool of an old enemy. With Ben Browder.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton and the crew desperately search for food to nurse an ailing friend back to health, but they may have to sacrifice a friend to save one.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Zhaan, Chiana and Rygel come to grips with the apparent deaths of Crichton, Aeryn and D'Argo.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: After an enemy ship fires on Moya, crew members find that their personalities have been switched. With Ben Browder.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Contact with a mysterious light source creates three separate Crichtons from different rungs of the evolutionary ladder.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Look at the Princess: A Kiss Is but a Kiss
programme.desc: Moya and her crew land on a planet just in time to celebrate the coronation of a new royal couple, but there is a catch -- the princess has not found her prince.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Look at the Princess: I Do, I Think
programme.desc: A quick turn of events sees Crichton chosen as the unwilling groom-to-be in the upcoming royal wedding.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Look at the Princess: The Maltese Crichton
programme.desc: Someone removes Crichton's head from a statue; Aeryn examines her choices; Zhaan faces a Moya builder.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: A crew member falls prey to a shape-shifting parasite and the rest of the crew must locate it before it is too late.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton becomes a mental slave on a commerce planet and must trust his greatest enemy, Scorpius, to help him see the truth through the illusions.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The crew races to save Crichton after contact with a Hyper Stream of Time speeds up his aging process.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The crew faces death after a Plokavian ship meets its fate under suspicious circumstances. With Ben Browder.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Chiana's unknowing part in the Nebari scheme to control a portion of the galaxy is revealed after they take over the Moya.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Liars, Guns and Money: A Not So Simple Plan
programme.desc: Stark plans to rob a less-than-reputable bank to get them money for a sizeable purchase of slaves, but things don't quite go the way he thought.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Liars, Guns and Money: With Friends Like These
programme.desc: Infected currency from the Shadow Depository threatens the crew of the Moya as they decide how best to rescue D'Argo's son.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Liars, Guns and Money: Plan B
programme.desc: The crew of the injured Moya must rely on the help of disorganized mercenaries to save Crichton from Scorpius.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: An alien surgeon comes to the aid of Crichton, removing the control chip from his head and healing the Moya.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The Moya's crew must quickly recover from their last adventure because Scorpius is up to his old tricks.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: An outrageous love triangle ignites dangerous sparks aboard a space station, where the crew find themselves trapped during a powerful interstellar storm.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton learns the elusive technology that could allow him to return home to Earth, but while he is preoccupied with the consequences a crew member unsuspectingly nears death.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Self-Inflicted Wounds: Wait for the Wheel
programme.desc: A crew member must volunteer to stay behind to guide the sabotaged ship, knowing that it will soon be atomized.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The crew goes back in time at an ancient battle site. With Ben Browder and Claudia Black.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: D'Argo, Chiana and Jool (Anthony Simcoe, Gigi Edgley, Tammy MacIntosh) are preyed upon by brain-sucking aliens and corpse-eating Xarai.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The crew must travel to a warring planet to obtain medicine for Talyn, who was injured in a skirmish with a Peacekeeper Retrieval Squad.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: A giant Budong swallows the crew. With Ben Browder and Claudia Black.
